attributes.action: fund the air time of the Dr Hilary Meningitis Awareness advert on main channels at prime times at regular times throughout the year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we also want to see some sort of course- reminder lesson put in place that everyone in the health-care - childcare idustry must take part in every year. 
Parents/ carers MUST be take seriously when seeking medical attention if they suspect their child may have meningitis.
